title.rendered: Fruit masks for glowing skin, quick, easy, cheap

content.rendered:
Fruit masks for glowing skin is a natural way for those who want beautiful skin. If your skin is no longer glowing, it means your skin needs more attention. Using chemical products might help, but a homemade natural beauty routine gives you more than your expectation.
If you have oily skin, fruit mask reduces excess oil and helps your skin shine all day long. Before any change in your beauty routine, make sure to include fruit masks for glowing skin.

Apple mask

If you want soft, clear, and glowing skin, follow a regular skincare routine and include an apple mask to beautify your skin in your daily skincare program.

What you need:

  • A banana, diced and then smashed
  • An apple, unpeeled, diced and then blended
  • one teaspoon of rice flour
  • one teaspoon of honey

What is the procedure?

First of all, put two spoons of smashed banana in a bowl. Banana has vitamins A and E. These vitamins help the skin grow new cells. After that add two spoons of blended apple. Then add honey, honey has moisturizing properties and hydrates the skin. Then add flour. Flour makes the mask pasty, and before applying it to your skin, make sure your skin is free of dirt and dust. You can use steam to clean your skin before applying the mask. Steam opens pores, allowing the skin to be nourished. Now your skin is ready to adopt the mask, which should be applied for twenty minutes.

Milk-lemon mask

If you are looking for a natural sunscreen, try something with vitamins. Vitamin C reduces the effects of UVB-induced erythema. Erythema appears as redness of the skin surface caused by the dilation of superficial blood vessels, either from damage or sensitization. This mask brings vitamin C to your skin.

Vitamin C fights free radicals and helps brighten the skin as well as protect skin from darkening.

What you need

  • one teaspoon of salt
  • one teaspoon of milk
  • one teaspoon of lemon juice

How to make it?

Add salt to milk, then add lemon juice. Lemon has vitamin C, the key factor in improving skin texture. Also, vitamin C helps reduce freckles and signs of aging skin and also brightens the skin. After mixing milk, salt, and lemon juice, apply it to your skin and massage for at least 2 minutes. This mask is an effective cleanser in removing excess oil and dirt from your face. Then wash it off with water.

Glow your skin with coconut milk

It is very beneficial to brighten and glow the skin with coconut milk. It has been proved that coconut milk by brightening the dark marks can glow the skin.  

  • Two or three slices of tomato
  • Coconut milk, one cup

Place the tomato slices in coconut milk and let them sit for 30 minutes.  Put the tomato slices on your skin for 30 minutes. This amount of time is enough for your skin to absorb all the vitamins from this mask, you can wash it now.

Try papaya

Using fruit masks for glowing skin is way better than using chemical products that cost lots of money and effort.

This mask is very easy to make. It takes only five minutes.

  • two tablespoons of papaya puree
  • One tablespoon of milk

mix the papaya puree with the milk thoroughly. Your cleaning mask is ready to be used. The natural vitamin A and papain (specific protein in papaya) in papaya helps break down the proteins and encourages collagen production and elasticity. Papaya is rich in phytochemicals and beta-carotene which contribute to lightening the skin.

Banana remedy

Banana mask is one of the best kinds of fruit masks for glowing skin.

Here are what you should prepare for this:

  • One banana, mashed
  • One tablespoon of turmeric
  • ¼ avocado, mashed

Let us get started,

Blend the banana and the turmeric together. Turmeric helps skin look young, removes dirt and spots, and has whitening properties as well. Banana has a moistening effect. In the end, add avocado. If your mask becomes stiff, you can add water or cucumber juice. Next, apply the mask to your skin. You can use a brush. Wash it off after a few minutes of massage.

Indian version of fruit mask for glowing skin.

This mask reduces signs of black and dark spots and helps skin glow.

  • One tomato
  • One teaspoon of aloe Vera gel
  • Two teaspoons of rice flour
  • One teaspoon of turmeric

Cut a tomato in half, grate, and strain it. I recommend you to use fresh tomato for this mask, not some mashed tomatoes that you may have found in the back of your refrigerator.

then add aloe Vera gel and flour and mix them thoroughly. Aloe Vera gel is a moisturizer which also lightens blemishes. Use cotton balls to rub the mask on your skin. Leave it for 15 minutes and wash it off with warm water.

Be careful!!

Many people are sensitive to aloe Vera gel and turmeric. If you have sensitive skin or you are not aware of what your skin is sensitive to. Before use this mask or any other fruit mask, test it on a small portion of your skin.

 Avocado mask

This mask stimulates collagen production and brighten the skin.

ingredients:

  • One teaspoon of honey
  • One teaspoon of yogurt
  • Half of an avocado, mashed

Avocados improve your skin’s moisture and make it look fresh. To make this mask, mash half of the avocado and add honey and yogurt to it and mix it. Apply to your skin and do not wash it for at least 10 minutes.

excerpt.rendered: If you want your skin to glow all day long. Fruit mask is a natural and almost free remedy, fruits have benefit that help skin stay healthy and beautiful.
